About Me

BIO

I’m Habby and I love the technical and logical as much as I love the creative. I’ve worked on both sides of the spectrum, as a Software Engineer Intern at a startup as well as a Production Assistant at a large scale Music Festival. As a writer, Dramas are my jam, but most importantly, I love stories that give me a deeper sense of understanding and appreciation for the experience we’re all having as humans. Stories people can relate to, that make them laugh as they’re crying, wondering how they feel so seen and so understood.
